Class SequentialInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream

    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    not used, and did not work as needed.

    public class SequentialInputStream
extends InputStream
    Modeled after SequenceInputStream, this InputStream can continue to accept new streams.
